title: The Man on the beat
creator_credit: Roger MacDougall, Patricia Murray, Ralph Kemplen and Merlin Films
brief_description: The duties and training of a London policeman, known over the world for his courtesy. The London policeman is unarmed, and his duties vary from finding lost children to directing traffic. Dealing with crime is only an occasional part of the ordinary London policeman’s job.
creator_credit_for_label: Roger MacDougall, Patricia Murray, Ralph Kemplen and Merlin Films
